title: What time is Urf coming out
body: Ive been waiting all day to play it and i just wanna know what time it is coming out

replies.body: Per the [game mode FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210354503-Rotating-Game-Modes-FAQ), these events usually go live around noon on Fridays on NA.  Hang tight!
I think the confusion here is that he may be on EST, opposed to PST when the time is scheduled

That's fair.  Featured game modes have been fairly consistent for quite a while now, and go around sometime around noon pacific on Fridays and ends early monday.  It's not exactly on the dot, but it's usually activated around that time.  I hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9tvITx3o,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-24T18:44:40.513+0000)
>
> That's fair.  Featured game modes have been fairly consistent for quite a while now, and go around sometime around noon pacific on Fridays and ends early monday.  It's not exactly on the dot, but it's usually activated around that time.  I hope that helps!

Just wondering will AR URF be in customs while it out?

I don't recall any [featured game modes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210354503-Rotating-Game-Modes-FAQ) having their own custom versions.  I don't believe it will be possible to create a custom game currently for ARURF.  Sorry!
